server.name: io.github.f/prompts.chat-mcp
server.description: Search and retrieve AI prompts from prompts.chat, the social platform for AI prompts.
server.title: prompts.chat MCP Server

environmentVariables.description: API key for authenticated requests (enables save_prompt tool)
environmentVariables.name: PROMPTS_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Query string to filter prompts (e.g., users=a,b&categories=c,d&tags=e,f)
environmentVariables.name: PROMPTS_QUERY
